main.name: Praveen Patil
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am currently a Masters Student at University of Southern California specializing in Data Science. I worked as a Software Developer at Cisco Systems,Inc for 2.5 years. Before joining Cisco i was working as data analytics intern at Cisco and Research intern at IBM. I did my undergraduate studies in Computer Science from M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology, Bangalore.Skilled in Python,C,Java and Algorithms. Since the time I was introduced to the world of Computer Science, I have been working on various technologies like JAVA, SQL, PYTHON, JAVASCRIPT, C, C++, R, Web technologies, Internet Of Things, and likewise. My aspiration is to be a full stack developer and I am looking forward to seeking a platform for the same
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to reach out to me by shooting email below
